entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then west 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:29 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border in the morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:29 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
